scripts.predeploy: echo 'next export is part of the build script'
scripts.edgehancer:build: cd edgehancer && npx tsup request.ts --format esm --target es2020 --minify --clean --outDir ../dist/edgehancer
scripts.edgehancer:deploy: uniform integration definition edgehancer deploy --connectorType akeneo-pim-data-connection --archetype singleProduct --hook request ./dist/edgehancer/request.mjs
scripts.edgehancer:remove: uniform integration definition edgehancer remove --connectorType akeneo-pim-data-connection --archetype singleProduct --hook request ./dist/edgehancer/request.mjs
